strapiPost.title: Enhancements All Around
strapiPost.content:
Two organizations that independently work to better people's lives are taking a significant step together in addressing the specialty care needs of the region. 

  • Partnership: The Alice L. Walton Foundation and the Cleveland Clinic, the no. 2 hospital in the nation, created a joint initiative to improve specialty health care in Northwest Arkansas. 
  • Development: They plan to assess specialty care needs in the region and create a system where health and wellness are available to everyone. As Northwest Arkansas grows, the goal is to have “increased access to excellent and innovative care.”

Read more about the initiative HERE.
